title: add support for persistent rnns
body_html:
Couple minor issues

  1. it warns in tests, when testing variable length input with persistent (that's not a supported configuration). I can just omit test for this configuration.
  2. I was hoping to pass info that persistent is not supported from cudnn backend back to module, so that cudnn backend does not try to create persistent descriptor again and again, but that did not work.
body_text:
Couple minor issues

it warns in tests, when testing variable length input with persistent (that's not a supported configuration). I can just omit test for this configuration.
I was hoping to pass info that persistent is not supported from cudnn backend back to module, so that cudnn backend does not try to create persistent descriptor again and again, but that did not work.
body:
Couple minor issues
1) it warns in tests, when testing variable length input with persistent (that's not a supported configuration). I can just omit test for this configuration. 
2) I was hoping to pass info that persistent is not supported from cudnn backend back to module, so that cudnn backend does not try to create persistent descriptor again and again, but that did not work.
